text: Altered States is a 1980 American science fiction fantasy horror movie directed by Ken Russell and written by Paddy Chayefsky. It stars William Hurt, Blair Brown, Charles Haid, Drew Barrymore, John Larroquette and distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for two Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1981. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:1980 fantasy movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:1980 horror movies Category:1980 science fiction movies Category:1980 thriller movies Category:American drama movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Body horror movies Category:Cult movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about mind control Category:Movies about shapeshifting Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Boston Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Russell
title: Altered States
